name: Shooter Ship?
description:
Hey and I made this game in 1 Hour for a Challenge!

Mouse your Cursor Around for rotate the Player and Left Click to shoot bullets at enemy's in order to kill them

Created by: CottonTail Studio

Assets by: Zayn

Game made with: Unity3d 2021.1.15f1

User Interface Made With: Adobe illustrator

Enjoy and leave your feedback on our Discord server!
